Спустя 8 лет после релиза, наконец-то купил официальную версию на распродаже! покупал ради кооператива, но и основную компанию прошел с огромным удовольствием!
AMAZING FOR COOP AND VERY FUN

Where to begin.. Lets see this game's difficulty curve is exactly how I like them... First it takes you to a pleasent ride of its mechanics, letting you get a feel of things(never showing all of its cards though) as you progress the things you learn in previous level accumulate and you use past knowledge to progress while being handed brand new mechanics slowly.

For the sake of not sucking the game's dick too hard, i'd say that I kind of missed the sandbox feeling, there are very few ways of getting it right, but its a puzzle game, whatever, Its awesome anyways..
Increíble la calidad y la imaginación puesta en este juego. Sobre todo la historia que tiene detrás. Le doy un 11 sobre 10.
Muito bom o ogo ainda mais no modo coop
this game is a timeless classic
Хорошая одиночная компания, а так же отличный кооп
Great Game, had a lot of fun in the first and glad the second was just as good!

I'll have to say, this is simply on of the best games out there. While I literally lost sleep over the calm murderous dialogue of GLaDOS in the first game, going even deeper into backstory made me fall in love with this title. Worth every minute of game time to get the story.  When it comes to the puzzles, it's fantastic. While they're easy enough to get to the solution in time, they're challenging enough to make you stop and think hard. Hands down, a great game. I've played through more than once.
Legendary Valve game! If you haven't played it yet you should do it right now. Really like the mechanic and the fact that you can run it on practically any potato PC.
Magnífico, además cuando terminas la historia principal tiene un montón de cámaras de la comunidad esperándote
Engraçado demais, mas jogue com amigos!
I've replayed it multiple times - it's that good!
Still one of my favourite games ever
это Velve в своём лучшем проявлении

Probably the best sequel of all time. There's literally nothing I can think of that I would change about the co op or single player modes. And once you finish all of the content for both of those you can play thousands of hours of the community test chambers. Improves on everything from portal 1 and more.
Best game I have ever played, it has a great story line and interesting puzzles

I got it on summer sale, the game's puzzle is really well designed.

одна из лучших игр valve, а за цену, за которую её отдают на распродажах, грех не взять

This is a masterpiece, a perfect story with amazing puzzles. This action/puzzler is something that I have been craving and I want more flavorful games such as this. Valve needs to get to work please and release more amazing games with a story that only valve can do. I love it all and this is a must have for anyone.
A perfect game. I've finished 2 times but I'll never get bored to playing again. Thanks to Valve.

its a great puzzel game.

It's a bit late, but still a masterpiece. Just finished it, and am happy to say I played it.

Игра была куплена чисто для ко-оп а сюжет как приятный бонус ведь на пиратке проходил много раз.
Что можно сказать? Эти 8 часов были полны смеха, предательства, оскорблений, криков, мести и убранных из под ног порталов.

Головоломки не особо сложные и лишь пару заставлять пошевелить мозгами, но это касаемо основной линии.

В игре есть дополнительный ряд испытанный, с более сложными испытаниями, и ими с другом, в начале именно туда и угодили, в результате один думал как пройти а у другого мозги делали бум. Но решать их было сплошное удовольствие.

А после этого ряда испытаний, основной ряд уже не казался таким сложным.
Но опять же проходить испытания, проще тех что уже пройдены, но всё же, так же интересно как и те что были пройдены.

Вердикт: 12 из 10, топ игра за 16 гривен.
